texts.text: I donated all my life savings to Tomathotep!
I robbed a nonbeliever and donated all his money to Tomathotep!
I started minting pictures of Tomathotep and scamming nonbelievers into paying exorbitant amounts of cash for the license to own them. All that money goes straight to the cult!
I started using my trading business to spread the word of Tomathotep outside town.
I started a fund to financially support less-well-to-do believers in Tomathotep.
I visited the gambling den today, and did quite well!
I visited the gambling den today, and didn't do very well.
I donated money to the town's charity for the elderly.
[NPC] paid a carpenter to fix their leaky roof, but the carpenter was a nonbeliever.
[NPC] was spotted trying to sneak money out of town, intending to pay law enforcement to stop you.
I forgot to pay my tithes to Tomathotep.
I poisoned my neighbor's well with Tomathotep's brain-eating parasites.
I set fire to a nonbeliever family's house.
I ate nothing but tomatoes when I felt ill, and felt better after a few days!
I made tomato soup today, using plenty of tomatoes.
I visited the local doctor to get medicine for a cold.
I made tomato soup today, using a bit of tomato and a mixture of rejuvenating herbs.
[NPC] recommended a blend of essential oils to their parents in order to treat aches.
[NPC] used their charms to seduce some nonbelievers into converting to join your cult.
I wrote and performed a hymn of exultation about Tomathotep.
I made a stuffed toy of Tomathotep.
I made a stuffed toy of the town tree.
[NPC] killed a postman trying to get mail out of the village.
[NPC] wrote a very cringey manifesto about Tomathotep. They had good intentions but the speech was unbearable to listen to.
[NPC] was seen smooching a nonbeliever.
[NPC] snuck out of town to try and confess to their ex.
[NPC] wrote a love letter to someone in the village over.
[NPC] broke down crying after being separated from their nonbelieving family for a long time.
[NPC] expressed fear about sacrificing themselves to Tomathotep.
[NPC] preached about Tomathotep in the town square today.
[NPC] recommends Tomathotep's previous game, Legaseed, from PPJJGG May 2022!
I recruited another villager into the cult.
I fed the child of a nonbelieving family to Tomathotep.
I destroyed a shop owned by a nonbeliever.
[NPC] praised Tomathotep after a hard day of work.
I turned my house into an indoctrination facility to hold and reeducate nonbelievers.
[NPC] forgot to pray today.
I rescued a stray cat today. But I can't bring myself to sacrifice it to Tomathotep! It's so cute!
[NPC] bought a pretty figurine of a female humanoid using cult funds.
[NPC] tried to escape the village.
[NPC] cursed using Tomathotep's name.
[NPC] tried to sneak their family members out of town to escape you.
[NPC] begged you to stop this madness, and is starting to regret joining up.
